creator: HT Media Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Hindi News App (हिंदी न्यूज़) by Hindustan (हिन्दुस्तान), a Hindi newspaper (हिंदी न्यूजपेपर), brings you the latest news (हिंदी लेटेस्ट न्यूज़), Hindi news updates (ताजा हिंदी समाचार), breaking news (ब्रेकिंग न्यूज हिंदी), live news coverage (हिंदी न्यूज लाइव) and trending stories (ट्रेंडिंग न्यूज़) from India and around the world.

The Hindi News (हिंदी खबर) App features in-depth coverage of latest news (ताजा खबर), stories from India (भारत समाचार), World (अंतरराष्ट्रीय समाचार), Sports (खेल समाचार), Cricket (क्रिकेट समाचार), religion news (धर्म) Entertainment (बॉलीवुड समाचार), Crimes (अपराध समाचार), Gadgets (गैजेट्स), Viral Videos (वीडियो), Photos (तस्वीरें), Lifestyle (लाइफस्टाइल टिप्स), UP Assembly Election (यूपी विधानसभा चुनाव), (चुनाव 2022 समाचार), and Health (स्वास्थ्य) tips. The best Hindi newspaper app also gives you a daily dose of Hindustan's editorial analysis & opinion. Among Hindi news apps (न्यूज़ ऐप) in India, we are the leading Indian news app covering local news from important states like Delhi-NCR (दिल्ली समाचार), UP (यूपी न्यूज), Bihar (बिहार न्यूज), Jharkhand (झारखंड न्यूज), MP (एमपी न्यूज), Rajasthan (राजस्थान न्यूज) and Uttarakhand (उत्तराखंड न्यूज).

Hindustan Hindi News App Features:

- Hindustan App offers you a personalized news experience, based on your interests and location.
- Breaking News (ताजा खबर): Hindustan App provides breaking news (ब्रेकिंग न्यूज़) and latest news flash (ताज़ा खबरें) from more than 150 Indian cities.
- Daily Horoscope in Hindi: Read your daily (आज का राशिफल), weekly (साप्ताहिक राशिफल), monthly (मासिक राशिफल) & yearly Horoscopes (वार्षिक राशिफल) in Hindi. Also, learn everything about Astrology, Numerology and Astro
- Business (कारोबार) news, latest updates from Economy, Stock Market, Finance, Sensex - BSE India, Nifty- NSE.
- Real-Time Cricket News Updates: Get Live cricket scores, Hindi news commentary.
- Now get push notifications in a much cleaner and user-friendly UI.
- Informative stories and features to improve your Lifestyle – Health (सेहत), Wellness, Fitness, Food and Recipes, Travel and much more.
- Photos: Photo Galleries and Slideshows of the latest news, entertainment, sports, business and lifestyle genre.
- Movie Reviews: Read and write film reviews in Hindi from your smartphone.
- Epaper: Read all the latest Hindi newspapers from your city.
- Audio News: 'Text to Speech' feature for news and articles to help you listen to content on the go
- Option to save your favorite news and articles to read later, even when offline.

Visit our site: livehindustan.com
